title: Potato and porcini mushroom soup

ingredients.content: 300 g potatoes, peeled and cut into pieces (2 cm)
80 g brown onion, cut into halves
50 g salted butter, cut into pieces
4 sprigs fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves and stalks, chopped for garnishing

preparations.content: Place mushrooms into mixing bowl and mill <b>15 sec/speed 10<b>.

Add potatoes, wine, water, cream, onion, garlic, stock paste, salt, black pepper, nutmeg and cayenne pepper and cook <b>20 min/90°C/speed 1<b>, then blend <b>30 sec/speed 6<b>-<b>10, gradually increasing speed from speed 6 to speed 10<b>.
Add butter and mix <b>15 sec//speed 8<b>. Divide between serving bowls, then swirl through crème fraîche and garnish with parsley before serving.

hintsAndTricks: Please refer to The Basic Cookbook or Everyday Cookbook for the Vegetable stock paste.
